name: Royal Hicacos

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I returned from Sandals Varadero one week ago and have been debating a little while about what star rating to give my visit. I decided to settle on a score of 3 for several reasons.
reviews.title: So So Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Compared to the 5* hotel I stayed at in Havana, Sandals was significantly inferior in terms of room quality and breakfast. 3 out of the 4 days we stayed, there was no hot water in the shower. This was our honeymoon which was mentioned at the time of booking but there was no acknowledgement of this by the hotel.
reviews.title: Gets better every YEAR!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We managed to dine in all of the a la carte restaurants. The only one we liked was the sea food restaurant. Lunch at the buffet was the best part with a large choice of grilled fish on offer. I don't understand the restaurant booking system as none of the restaurants were full when we dined at them yet you have to book 2-3 days in advance.
reviews.title: The food and cocktails. What are they thinking???? :(
Eleven visits to our "second home" and wonderful friends in Cuba
reviews.text: We did all of the sports such as scuba, snorkling, catamaran, cayak which was really nice. They start to pack away around 3pm so you have to go in the morning.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: There was nightly entertainment followed by a disco. Usually there were 3 people or so dancing away each night, perhaps there are more lively times of the year to visit as the resort felt a little desserted each evening.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel and great vacation

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at this wonderful resort in early April. We were there for a week in a Concierge Suite then went to Iberostar Laguna Azul for our wedding the week after.
reviews.title: Wow, I have to say the best resort I've seen in Cuba for my fourth visit!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Flight:
reviews.title: A great vacation

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our flight was cancelled with Sunwing so we lost a full day but it was caused by weather. The flight itself was amazing, good service!
reviews.title: Best hotel in cuba?

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Arrival/Check-in:
reviews.title: Nice place....great staff!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We arrived at the airport and were greeted by Sandal staff that showed us to a cab that drove us two directly to the resort no wait! Got to the desk and had to wait 30 minutes for the concierge staff to greet us. This was understandable given the fact that our flight had been cancelled the day before.
reviews.title: Amazing beach and people

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My lover and best mate had two nights in Havana prior to spending 11 wicked nights at this hotel.. At first to be totally honest we were scepitcal as reading prior reviews were unsure what to expect.
reviews.title: Best Holiday Ever....!
Amazing in a word
reviews.text: Upon arrival, check in was hassle free, friendly reception staff, glass of fizz on arrival then our ride to our room set the buzz off for us.. with Jackie Chan as he called himself with me on my partners lap whizzing round on a buggy on paths to our room.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Room was spacious and big and plaenty of storage for everything, massive bath and shower over the top with a seperate toilet which was handy...!!
reviews.title: Wonderful vacation

reviews.text: Loads of choice at the buffet morning, noon and night.. flies pee'd me off but your in a tropical climate so you gotta expect a few pests... We ate at 3 of the restaurants and all were good with the Carribean being the one of choice, the ambeience set the mood perfect where as the others had no music and no atmosphere! Food was tasty in all three thou.. didnt eat at the grill at all at night as the majority said that the food was a bit touch and go and the service rushed.. ideal setting but when you have been laid ojn the beach grilling all day, which was gorgeous with pelicans flying past and clear warm sea.. we thought we'd spend a bit of time in other parts of the hotel cos had over dosed on burgers and hotdog,s which I must add are tasty but dirty and greasy!english term for very bad!! The buffet had a great choice, the bar also catering for whatever you wanted and the staff really were superb.. Gotta give a mention to Yoslen for her Crépes, waffles and ommlettes and her smile made our morning.. Also Leonardo.. what a little diamond! Both in the buffet restaurant. Entertainment staff didnt manage to get me from my sunbed but my beau had a wicked time doing various activities...
reviews.title: Trip of a lifetime

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Pool area nice with plenty of sunbeds but Im a beach bum so was always there.. First few days was a bit of a shock that the majority of the sunbeds were taken at the front of the beach and good places round the pool with towells, but we wised up and got there earlier and played the game but if you did got to pi**ed then youd still get a couple of beds..
reviews.title: Worth every penny

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had the best weather ever. The food and atmosphere at the Caribe and Beach Restaurants were perfect. The front desk,concierge and bar/food staff were all excellent.
reviews.title: Perfect weather,food,room and staff second to none!

reviews.text: The buffet was always good ,morning,noon and night. The upgrades to the resort add one more touch of class. Being picked up and dropped off at the airport by their own shuttle service is a very nice added touch. Will be returning in spring of 2012 under the Concierge Plan
reviews.title: Loved it! Amazing people, beautiful beach, great food!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Terry & Donna Ellis Golden Lake,On Canada
reviews.title: Not For Solo's

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We booked a week at the Royal Hicacos, April 9-16th. Would go back in a heartbeat. Very clean, very welcoming, no bugs or critters; I didn't even notice so much as a fly until the 4th day! The buffet was good, and there are 4 a la carte restaurants, plus a beach grill and a bistro...so you will never be far from your next meal, and they are all great!
reviews.title: A slpendid hotel!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Firstly let me apologise to anyone who stumbled across me or I stumbled across on my drunken binge I can honestly say I have never been so intoxicated
reviews.title: Wonderful Trip

description: Nestled within lush tropical gardens and just steps from the azure blue waters and powder white sand of Cuba's finest beach lies the award-winning, all-suite Sandals Royal Hicacos Resort and Spa, where its natural beauty is surpassed only by the warmth of its people.
